name: railway
title: Railway
description: A Raycast extension to search for projects on Railway.
author: aldotestino4

commands.name: list-projects
commands.title: List Projects
commands.description: Show a list of your Railway projects

preferences.name: railwayApiKey
preferences.title: Railway API Key
preferences.description: Create a Railway API Key at https://railway.app/account/tokens

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
